articles.author: Kelly Kasulis Cho
articles.title: Fed up with U.S. health care costs, these Americans moved abroad - The Washington Post
articles.description: Three Americans explain why they left for Italy, South Korea and France, after crippling medical debt or a lack of coverage left them afraid to seek medical help at home.
articles.content:
Jennifer Sontag cracked her skull and couldnt afford emergency brain surgery. Her doctors suggested she start a GoFundMe.
Their advice was, Youve got to get the surgery. Youll work it out later, she… [+102 chars]
